archimate:InfluenceRelationship.name: supports
archimate:InfluenceRelationship.documentation:
https://trello.com/c/T4YPNhPk/45-zirius
In Norway, an alternative to register cash sales on a cash register system, is to issue a "cash invoice" ("kontantfaktura", also known as "kontantnota"). It would be a great improvement to have this as standardised document in Peppol so it could be sent as an e-document with structured data.
